description: With a love for problem-solving, I have worked as an infanteer in the Canadian Army, honing my skills in punctuality, teamwork, and charisma to engage with others and achieve results. Using a logical and straightforward approach, I tackle any problem I’m faced with, combining curiosity and military-level discipline to find effective and efficient solutions. Attention to detail and clear communication are critical in overcoming challenges, and I consistently support my team while continuously improving my skills and effectiveness.
